name: Tabassum Sheliya
description: With over 15 years of experience as a Technical Product Manager, Tabassum has overseen the development and delivery of complex digital products across multiple industries. Her strength lies in bridging the gap between business goals and technical execution — ensuring that every product is practical, scalable, and aligned with what end-users truly need.

name: Mehdi Musa
description: As Co-Founder and a skilled Full Stack Developer & Team Leader, Mehdi brings over 5 years of hands-on experience in building modern, performance-focused applications using React, Node.js, and Python. He leads Infatech’s development team with a sharp eye for clean architecture, smooth integrations, and user-centric design.

name: Dr. Anu Khanchandani
description: A trusted name in the industry, Dr. Anu Khanchandani brings 25+ years of expertise in product strategy and business growth consulting. As a mentor at Infatech, she ensures that every solution we build is rooted in sound strategy and positioned for long-term success — not just quick fixes.

name: Rahul Mehta
description: Rahul leads our design team with 8+ years of experience crafting intuitive user experiences for fintech, healthcare, and SaaS platforms. He is known for design systems and interaction logic.

name: Sneha Kapoor
description: ISTQB-certified QA leader with 10+ years in automation, functional, and performance testing. Sneha ensures each product release is reliable, secure, and efficient.

name: Vikram Rao
description: Vikram is a skilled developer proficient in React, Node.js, and Python. He builds scalable web apps and APIs, and mentors junior developers in clean code and best practices.

name: Nisha Arora
description: Nisha ensures project delivery with agility and accountability. Certified in Scrum and PMP, she bridges clients and tech teams while managing timelines, risks, and execution.
